name: Eastern Europe Truck Simulator
description:
Travel across Eastern Europe Truck Simulator as king of the roads, where you are a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! Eastern Europe Truck Simulator offers everything a trucker’s heart desires!

In this realistic truck simulation game which include dangerous & unique roads from this part of Europe.

Additionally, numerous other points of interest are waiting to be discovered along your journey, as well.

Game Features:
- 10 different hard missions
- Lots of different cargoes to be transported
- 3 trucks
- Earn coins from each mission
- You will have a limited time for each mission
